name: The Last Fencer
description:
Be the last great fencer to survive. Never turn your back on your enemy or you will never see them strike...

  • 2-4 Players local multiplayer game using 1 keyboard. (Must be played with a 100% keyboard for 4 players, Controller not supported yet)
  • Fast paced fencing game where all the attacks can be parried except the only way to defeat the opponent is at the back. 
  • Battle throughout 3 different stages with their own set of obstacle
  • 3 different orbs to mess with the enemies.

===========================================
